c74object.name: bach.is
c74object.description: Returns the type of the incoming data.

inlet.digest: The data whose type will be reported

outlet.digest: The numeric representation of the contained data types
outlet.description: The numeric representation is one of the following values: 1 = null, 2 = integer, 4 = rational, 8 = float, 16 = symbol, 32 = llll.

outlet.digest: The symbolic representation of the contained data types
outlet.description: The symbolic representation is one of the following symbols: i = integer, r = rational, f = float, s = symbol, l = llll, null.

method.name: bang
method.description: Returns the data type of the most recently received data.

method.name: llll
method.digest: Return the type of the incoming data
method.description: Returns the "minimum" type of the incoming data: that is, if a single-element llll is received, the data type of its element is output.

c74object.discussion: The data type is returned in a symbolic representation from the second outlet and as a numeric one from the first outlet.

entry.name: Inlet 1 (llll)
entry.description: The data whose type will be reported.

entry.name: Outlet 1 (int)
entry.description: The numeric representation of the contained data types. The numeric representation is one of the following values: 1 = null, 2 = integer, 4 = rational, 8 = float, 16 = symbol, 32 = llll.

entry.name: Outlet 2 (llll)
entry.description: The symbolic representation of the contained data types. The symbolic representation is one of the following symbols: i = integer, r = rational, f = float, s = symbol, l = llll, null.

entry.name: More details
entry.description: The data type is returned in a symbolic representation from the second outlet and as a numeric one from the first outlet.
